## Plot one continuous variable 

```{r}
#| fig-cap: "Distribution of BMI"
#| label: fig-bmi-histo
ggplot(post_meal_data, aes(x = BMI)) +
  geom_histogram()

```
Ved at tilføje Label kan man referere til figuren, f.eks.: See @fig-bmi-histo
